exception.name: ErrorUserNotAuthenticated
exception.description: This exception is thrown if the user who has invoked a restricted SE API function has not the status "authenticated".

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated that is thrown if the user who has invoked a restricted SE API function has not the status "authenticated".

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when restricted function is invoked without authentication
specification.applicability: All restricted API functions requiring authentication
